# Palace (Building)
## Overview
**Palace**

**Create** 453 Goods, 42 Influence, 421 Labor, 9 Magic (19,640 gp)

**Rooms** 1 [[Altar (Room)|Altar]], 1 [[Ballroom (Room)|Ballroom]], 1 [[Bar (Room)|Bar]], 2 [[Bath (Room)|Baths]], 6 [[Bedroom (Room)|Bedrooms]], 1 [[Bunks (Room)|Bunks]], 1 [[Cell (Room)|Cell]], 1 [[Common Room (Room)|Common Room]], 2 [[Courtyard (Room)|Courtyards]], 1 [[Crypt (Room)|Crypt]], 6 [[Defensive Wall (Room)|Defensive Walls]], 1 [[Escape Route (Room)|Escape Route]], 6 Furnishings (in the [[Ballroom (Room)|Ballroom]], 2 [[Bedroom (Room)|Bedrooms]], [[Office (Room)|Office]], [[Sitting Room (Room)|Sitting Room]], and the [[Throne Room (Room)|Throne Room]]), 1 [[Garden (Room)|Garden]], 1 [[Gatehouse (Room)|Gatehouse]], 2 [[Kitchen (Room)|Kitchens]], 1 [[Labyrinth (Room)|Labyrinth]], 1 [[Laundry (Room)|Laundry]], 2 [[Lavatory (Room)|Lavatories]], 2 [[Lodging (Room)|Lodgings]], 2 [[Office (Room)|Offices]], 1 [[Sanctum (Room)|Sanctum]], 3 [[Secret Room (Room)|Secret Rooms]], 3 [[Sitting Room (Room)|Sitting Rooms]], 1 [[Sports Field (Room)|Sports Field]], 4 [[Stall (Room)|Stalls]], 2 [[Statue (Room)|Statues]], 6 [[Storage (Room)|Storages]], 1 [[7 - Throne Room|Throne Room]], 1 [[21 - Trophy Room|Trophy Room]], 2 [[Vaults]], 1 [[D14 - War Room|War Room]]

A grand edifice and grounds demonstrating wealth, power, and authority to the world.
